name: World Conference on Industrial and Manufacturing Engineering
content: Not sure which manufacturing conferences 2023 to add to your calendar? Look no further. The World Conference on Industrial and Manufacturing Engineering is a must-attend event for anyone working in this academic field. The expert panel of presenters of this Manufacturing Conference will deliver high-quality presentations on the most relevant subjects in the field: laser-based manufacturing, safety and risk management, advanced design, cloud manufacturing, automation, artificial intelligence, and many others. This academic event is the perfect platform to present your research and solidify your reputation as an influential expert in the field. Submit your abstract and the scientific committee of Industrial Conferences 2023 will evaluate it for quality, authenticity, and relevancy. Get published.
